emails.subject: Operation Eagle’s Nest

emails.subject: RE: Operation Eagle’s Nest
emails.email:
I attached an encrypted file to this email. The password is our account balance (too low lmao).

emails.subject: RE: Set Up for the Plan
emails.email: Excellent. I’m going to spend $289 tonight to buy… materials.

emails.subject: I need you. Now.
emails.email: Did you do the math homework?

emails.subject: RE: I need you. Now.
emails.email: There was math homework? Lol you’re on your own.

emails.subject: ayyushi please
emails.email: I’ve found a guy who sells it, but he only takes Jonesbucks! (He said something about them not being traceable.) Can you transfer me some?

emails.subject: RE: aayushi please
emails.email:
Fine, but only if you agree to the following terms: 
 *On Feburary 2, 2019--no sooner and no later--you are to pay me in United States dollars for Jonesbucks. 
 *If the USD to Jonesbuck rate causes my Jonesbucks to drop in value compared to the US dollar on Feburary 2, you will pay me at the Jonesbucks exchange rate as of the time this email is sent. 
 *If the USD to Jonesbuck rate causes my Jonesbuck to retain or increase their value compared to the US dollar on Feburary 2, you will pay me back at the Jonesbuck exchange rate as of Feburary 2. 
 If you agree, I’ll send you the terms.

emails.subject: RE: RE: ayyushi please
emails.email: Why do you have to make everything so complicated? Fine--but you’re lucky I need these Jonesbucks.
